text: Group Nine Media was an American digital media company based in New York City. The company owned Thrillist, NowThis, The Dodo, Seeker, and more. In December 2021, Vox Media bought Group Nine Media. == References== Category:News media Category:Defunct companies of the United States Category:2016 establishments in the United States Category:2022 disestablishments in the United States
title: Group Nine Media
